Package rockpaperscissors

Class Option

java.lang.Object
rockpaperscissors.Option
public class Option extends Object
Option represents one option in the rock-paper-scissors game.
Author:
Henri Johansson

    • Option

      public Option​(RockPaperScissors currentOption, RockPaperScissors wins, RockPaperScissors loses)
      Constructor sets the option, winning option and losing option.
      Parameters:
      currentOption - is the current option of the object.
      wins - is an option that wins this option.
      loses - is an option that loses to this option.

    • winsTheComparison

      public Option winsTheComparison​(Option guest)
      Compares two options and returns the one that wins in the comparison.
      Parameters:
      guest - to compare with type of Option.
      Returns:
      the winning option or null if it's a tie type of Option.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)
      Compares two options and checks if they are the same.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the second object to compare with.
      Returns:
